snippet: The judge reversed an order issued this week that the 9-month-old girl be removed from the home because of the women’s sexual orientation.
abstract: Utah Judge Scott N Johansen, responding to criticism, reverses his order that foster child be taken away from lesbian couple Rebecca Peirce and April M Hoagland, but indicates matter may not be settled; Johansen's actions place him at center of debate over whether same-sex married couples should be allowed custody of children under various circumstances.
lead_paragraph: The judge reversed an order issued this week that the 9-month-old girl be removed from the home because of the women’s sexual orientation.

headline.main: Utah Judge Drops Order on Lesbians’ Foster Child
headline.print_headline: Utah Judge Drops Order on Lesbians’ Foster Child

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
